Recordat

Live performance part of Recordat Label

Improvised session that contains several movements, each focusing on a specific type of field recording and synthetized tone. For instance, one movement featured field recordings of footsteps or traffic, while another featured a series of heavily modulated synthesized tones. The use of repetition and rhythm enhanced the transcendent quality of the piece and aimed to transport the listener to an altered state of consciousness.

At Arkaoda Berlin April 2022
